page.title: 15DISADVANTAGES OF RURAL LIFE
page.content: The same questionnaire produced responses giving a list of drawbacks which,as the responders would likely acknowledge,if rectified,would destroy what they came to{Bleasby}and{Thurgar- {ton}for in the first place!Comments were made about the paucity and cost of{public transport},{prices}at local shops,lack of"sophisticated"entertain- ment and amenities,especially for{teen { -agers,}inconvenience and cost of travelling,{traffic congestion}for commuters and that there is no local doctor,park or mains gas (Bleasby). Someone found it lonely at first,and one or two stated it was hard to have a social life. Happily,at least two replies stated that there were{no disadvantages. Two final complaints:crop spraying and,delightfully,night ploughing!Would our urban brethren sympathise?
